column4: Does anyone know what are the packages about  is kbd, gpm general purpose mouse driver , evdev and mousedev .. these are drivers but for what purposes ???
what do you want to do
I'm a new triager resaerching on touchpads ..
ok - so if you are part of the simar then you should know that this channel is for ubuntu support only, not generic linux questions
ya thats why i ask question about the general information about packages that i mentioned..
I mean not a working connection. I get such errors when the internet connection is down..
what about DNS - could it not just be a dns issue ?
whats the right channel to ask the question about the driver packages ..
if you look on launchpad.net you'll find out who  maintains the package and you can contact them
ok but i think synaptics is not on launchpad? Does in your knowledge they have a channel on irc?
synaptics is the package manager, not the package, you want to ask the maintainers of the packages gdm, etc
i'm talking about xserver-xorg-input-synaptics this is the touchpad drivers and not a part of x.
ok - so talk to the person who maintains xserver-xorg-input-synaptics
